# queryinner_join

## Brief Description
The queryinner_join function is a convenient way to combine the columns of two data frames in the [dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/) package. It can also be used in combination with other [tidyverse](http://tidyverse.org/) packages. 

## What Package Contains It
The queryinner_join function is part of the dplyr package.
